limited.title: Drill: Unidentified Region A16
limited.description: Earn Quest Points during the time limit
limited.clearCondition:
This is an unidentified practice drill discovered while analyzing battle data. Who created it and why are unknown, but the emphasis is on suppressing enemies quickly. Take this evaluation exam based on a test plan if you think you've got what it takes. 
――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――
 Quest Points reduced when the level disparity between you and the enemies is 7 or greater.

pettasVera.title: Subdue the Overseer-type DOLL
pettasVera.description: Powerful space-time fluctuations have been on the Alto Lani Plateau in Northern Aelio. Based on Past data, the Pedas Vera is expected to appear. All ARKS, head for the area & eliminate this threat.

nexVera.title: Nex Vera Subjugation
nexVera.description: Powerful space-time fluctuations have been detected in the Resol Forest. Based on past data, the Battlefield Overseer-type DOLL, the "Nex Vera", is expected to appear. All ARKS, head for the area & eliminate this threat.

miningRigDefenceAelio.title: Mining Rig Defense: Aelio
miningRigDefenceAelio.description: We've received a distress call from a mining unit operating on Halpha Grasslands. The high number of enemy readings nearby indicates they've come under a large-scale attack. All ARKS are to intercept and defend the Resource Mining Rigs.

dustylVera.title: Snaedal Vera Subjugation
dustylVera.description: Powerful space-time fluctuations have been at Morava Canyon in Northern Retem. Based on past data, the Snaedal Vera is expected to appear. All ARKS, head for the area & eliminate this threat.

renusVera.title: Lenus Vera Subjugation
renusVera.description: Powerful space-time fluctuations have been detected in Central Retem. Based on past data, the Battlefield Overseer-type DOLL, the "Lenus Vera", is expected to appear. All ARKS, head for the area & eliminate this threat.

miningRigDefenceRetem.title: Mining Rig Defense: Retem
miningRigDefenceRetem.description: We've received a distress call from a mining unit operating in the Al-demmond Desert. The high number of enemy readings nearby indicates they've come under a large-scale attack. All ARKS are to intercept and defend the Resource Mining Rigs.

crocodylisVera.description: Powerful space-time fluctuations have been detected in Danan Snowfield. Based on past data, the Battlefield Overseer-type DOLL, the Crocodallus Vera, is expected to appear. All ARKS, head for the area & eliminate this threat.

amsVera.title: Ams Vera Subjugation
amsVera.description: Powerful space-time fluctuations have been detected on Mt. Latva. Based on past data, the Battlefield Overseer-type DOLL, the Ams Vera, is expected to appear. All ARKS, head for the area & eliminate this threat.

miningRigDefenceKvaris.title: Mining Rig Defense: Kvaris
miningRigDefenceKvaris.description: We've received a distress call from a mining unit operating in Danan Snowfields. The high number of enemy readings nearby indicates they've come under a large-scale attack. All ARKS are to intercept and defend the Resource Mining Rigs.

doldorisVera.title: Doldoris Vera Subjugation
doldorisVera.description: Powerful space-time fluctuations have been detected on the northern part of Felusa Ridge. Based on past data, the Battlefield Overseer-type DOLL, the Doldoris Vera, is expected to appear. All ARKS, head for the area & eliminate this threat.

nilsVera.title: Nilus Vera Subjugation
nilsVera.description: Powerful space-time fluctuations have been detected at Dreisen Plant. Based on past data, the Battlefield Overseer-type DOLL, the Nilus Vera, is expected to appear. All ARKS, head for the area & eliminate this threat.

theBattleOfHalphiaLake.title: The Battle of Lake Halphiria
theBattleOfHalphiaLake.description: We have confirmed indications that Dark Falz Aegis is about to appear over Lake Halphiria. All ARKS are to move to intercept. It's time to use the Central Cannon to eliminate the greatest threat Halpha has ever known.

remnantsOfAmbition.title: Remnants of Ambition
remnantsOfAmbition.description: Powerful spacio-temporal resonance has been detected in the upper areas of Leciel. A powerful enemy is expected to appear, so we are instituting mandatory reconnaissance. All ARKS, head to the target location and investigate.

omenOfThePlanetbreaker.title: Harbinger of Extinction
omenOfThePlanetbreaker.description: A powerful energy reading, comparable to that of Dark Falz Aegis, has been detected in Central Retem. All ARKS are to dispatch to the location and eliminate this approaching thread.
